Sectoral background data for land-use, land-use change and forestry. Computes IPCC tables for reporting. Corresponds to Table 4.G s1 and Table 4.G s2

Sectoral background data for land-use, land-use change and forestry. Computes IPCC tables for reporting. Corresponds to Table 4.G s1 and Table 4.G s2

reportTable4G(year = 2013, table = c("all", "s1", "s2"))

Arguments

year

years to calculate values for.
table

table to calculate If table is s1 then returns table corresponding to HWP in use from domestic harvest. If table is s2 then returns HWP activity data which includes data for different types of wood and paper products.

Value

HWP Activity Data table that includes relevant data for reporting.

Examples

reportTable4G(table = "s2")
#> [[1]]
#>                                 Years     Gains   Losses
#> Solidwood from domestic harvest  2013 -27070.92 24004.43
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>                   Years     Gains   Losses HalfLives
#> Solidwood in SWDS  2013 -16472.32 4873.744      23.1
#> Paper in SWDS      2013 -12962.72 7567.108      14.5
#>

  • Value
